content.prompt: The development depicted in the excerpt had most in common with which of the following earlier developments?

choices.label: The passage of land reforms during the Civil War
The expansion of the telegraph system during the Gilded Age
The enactment of moral reform legislation during the Progressive Era
The efforts to mobilize popular support for the First World War

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
